directions: Halve eggs lengthwise and scoop yolks into a bowl. Mash yolks with a fork; stir cream cheese spread, mayonnaise, sweet relish, brown mustard, garlic, hot pepper sauce, salt, and black pepper into yolks.
Fill egg whites with yolk mixture; sprinkle deviled eggs with chives. Store covered in refrigerator.
ingredients: 1/2 cup whipped chive and onion cream cheese spread
salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Easter Spicy Deviled Eggs
